alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marquette County through 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near K. I. Sawyer Airport to near Watson. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... K. I. Sawyer Airport and Gwinn around 715 PM EDT. Harvey around 730 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Shot Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
